title: Ride or Die
description: Together they will combust with attraction and deadly intentions in this motorcycle club romance that will leave you breathless.Screwed.That’s the definition of Piper’s life and has been since the day she was born. The last thing she wants is a sexy stranger who rides a motorcycle, and not for fun—but for life, to come and screw things up some more.Everything about bikers is on her list of have nots especially when it comes to potential bed mates. But this guy won’t take no for an answer and it’s not getting in her pants he wants.She’s been summoned home and the cruelest bastard ever to live has been sent to fetch her. But unfortunately for him, she won’t go willing. He may be dangerous but she’s lethal.Ender’s not nice, never claimed to be. His job makes him one of the most feared men on the planet and he has the credentials to back it up. He’s not accustomed to playing babysitter to a woman who doesn’t want to be caught. But the boss wants her home and he’s there to do his job.Only when he meets her, she puts up too much of a fight and becomes too much of a temptation. Which means he’ll have to show her a side of himself, some people call …Cruel…Only keeping their hands off each other will be the least of their problems.
author: Terri E. Laine
